channel.title: Connecting Help
channel.description:
OK, this might be in tutorials, but i thought thaT i would ask... i know how to make a dl link, ive changed the server and clients ip's, and ive portforwarded... what do i have to do so that other people can dl my client and play on my server?
-srry about the typing mistakes, i'm typing one-handed and eating at the same time :p

item.title: Connecting Help
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

I registered my server, and it said that it isnt online… how do i put it online?

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Help
item.dc:creator: @tehsandbox tehsandbox
item.description:
@tehsandbox wrote:

host your no-ip and umm upload the client that connects to your no-ip adress like “runescape.no-ip.biz” then make sure you portforwarded right with canyouseeme.org and if it says it can see you then you just post on moparscae server status and jsut wait for players

Read full topic
